about_the_game:
Deathless Death is a narrative puzzle game featuring Psychological Thriller elements. In this story, you take on the role of a priest, entering a world filled with thoughts and illusions. Listen to the confessions of four sinners, uncover the secrets of their past, and unravel their fates intertwined by one woman.

Story

As the chimes strike the hour, you light the candles on the altar one by one. Upon lighting the fifth candle, drops of wax fall onto the pristine white altar. The flames flicker softly, awaiting the sinners to confess.

The confessional door opens, then closes. Through the cross-shaped screen, you cannot see their faces clearly. Their words are laced with lies, self-embellishment, fear, and bravado, but you must peel away each layer. Only when the fog of words is cleared will the truth behind the reflections emerge.

Soothe the restless souls, listen to the turmoil in their hearts, and extinguish the flames of their desires. This is your mission, and you are destined to reach the end.

Gameplay

【Point&Click Puzzle】

By listening to confessions and capturing the imagery within their words, you can glimpse into the mental landscape of the confessors.

【Immersive Performance】

Emotions cling to objects, memories lie buried in the past, all waiting for your gaze.

Immerse yourself in their chaotic thoughts—their lives and secrets are hidden within. Discern and uncover the mementos buried in their minds, and only then will they confess their sins.

【Moral Dilemma】

Will you redeem or condemn? Use your heart as the scale to weigh their sins and judge their fates. Their past cannot be rewritten, but they have entrusted you with their future.

The confessors' fates may seem insignificant to you, but each decision you make shapes a new version of yourself.

Game Features

  • Unique art style and immersive interactive performances

  • Innovative pop-up narrative with light puzzle-solving

  • Morally challenging choices and a panoramic exploration of the human psyche

About the Publisher

GCORES PUBLISHING is an independent game publishing venture formed by GCORES, committed to bringing you more outstanding indie games from the BOOOM CHALLENGE.

Feel free to follow our publisher webpage for future updates.

About BOOOM

BOOOM is an independent game brand by GCORES, The "BOOOM CHALLENGE" is held twice a year, featuring three weeks of development time and a specific theme. After the development phase, an online trial play game festival is held for all players, and these games are showcased at GCORES' large offline video game festival.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains a small amount of suggestive text or scenes involving violence and sex.

short_description: In the quiet of conscience and shadows of sin, four souls find themselves entwined in crimes involving a woman. In this narrative puzzle game, you don the sacred robe of a priest, hear the confessions of sinners, uncover secrets, seek the truth behind their crimes and deliver the final judgment.
